sections.title: Grand Marshal (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Grand Marshal class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Grand marshals gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Eye for Detail ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Adds Intelligence and Wisdom bonuses to Perception and Sense Motive checks, plus half level bonus against Disguise and Sleight of Hand.

sections.title: Legal Judgment ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Swift action ability providing combat bonuses similar to inquisitor judgment, with multiple judgment types including bulletproof, destruction, evasive, justice, lucky dodge, quick recovery, sharpshooter, and sure shot.

sections.title: Danger Sense ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Grants initiative bonus equal to half level and allows acting in surprise rounds even when unaware of opponents.

sections.title: Gunmarshal ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Grants gunslinger deeds at half level (stacking with gunslinger levels) and Charisma-based skill bonuses when displaying badge in region.

sections.title: Labyrinthine Cunning ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Prevents being lost in urban terrain, negates movement penalties from poor visibility, and allows opening/closing doors as swift actions.

sections.title: Urban Commando ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Treats urban areas as favored terrain like a ranger, with bonuses increasing at 10th level and stacking with existing favored terrain bonuses.

sections.title: Gunhunter ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Allows movement through crowds and difficult terrain in urban areas, plus enhanced Stealth capabilities including hiding without cover or concealment.

sections.title: Double Jeopardy ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Allows selecting two different judgments simultaneously when using legal judgment ability, consuming only one daily use.

sections.title: Quarry ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Can declare one target within line of sight as quarry, functioning exactly like the ranger ability of the same name.

sections.title: High Grand marshal ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Grand Marshal)
sections.description: Capstone ability allowing expenditure of legal judgment uses to create discern lies effects or take 20 on initiative or Charisma-based skill checks.
